overview:
Peter is a Director for Cross Creek Capital. He joined Cross Creek in 2010 after four years as a Senior Investment Manager for Fort Washington Capital Partners Group, where he assisted in managing its venture and private equity investment portfolios.

Prior to focusing on the investment side of private equity, Peter spent nearly 10 years operating in restructuring and marketing roles for venture and private equity funded companies.Â  His experience includes senior roles at PTC, Ancestry.com, Campus Pipeline and Icon Health and Fitness. Â Peter received his MBA from the Northwestern Kellogg Graduate School of Management and was a finalist for the Ewing Kauffman Venture Fellows program.
